thread.section_title: Uncle Dan's Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Uncle Dan's | udans.com | 2 of 32
thread.title: Hannah

author: Hannah
title: Hannah
text: I will most definitely order through Uncle Dan's now! I ordered a Patagonia Retool pullover in the beginning of February. I got $10 off my first order and had free shipping so it brought the total down the one of the cheapest prices on this jacket I wanted. With the free shipping it was 5-7 business days, and I am in California so I expected the longer shipping. To my surprise, they shipped it that day and I got it 3 days later! So easy, super fast, and I will definitely order through Uncle Dan's again, even despite the longer distance I am from them.
